articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Who is Xavier Bartlett, the Australia debutant who blew West Indies away? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Xavier Bartlett picked 4/17 on debut against West Indies to give Australia a 1-0 lead. All you need to know about the young pacer. | Cricket
articles.content: As Australia defeated West Indies by eight wickets to take a 1-0 lead in the series, a certain Xavier Bartlett emerged as the showstopper finishing with 4/17 on debut. Bartlett knocked the stuffing o… [+2204 chars]
